title.rendered: Middle School Student Summer Reading Log

content.rendered:
Maple Avenue Middle School students can earn Blue Streak Bucks for summer reading! Students are encouraged to keep track of their books and log their reading progress over the summer.

Click here to view the Maple Avenue Summer Reading Log.
